meanings.definition: Relating to the sense of hearing.
meanings.sent1: The auditives experience the beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: She has keen auditives that can detect even the faintest sound.
meanings.sent3: The auditives ears of the detective caught the whispered conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her auditives mind could hear the unspoken emotions in his voice.
meanings.sent5: The auditives nature of the music enveloped her in a world of sound.

meanings.definition: Sounds or noises that are heard.
meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with mysterious auditives at night.
meanings.sent2: The auditives of the city can be overwhelming for some people.
meanings.sent3: The auditives of laughter echoed through the room.
meanings.sent4: The auditives of the waves crashing against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: His auditives were delighted by the symphony of nature around him.
